item.title: Help, added shops?
item.dc:creator: @h311sd347h h311sd347h
item.description:
@h311sd347h wrote:

Now I get this error…

client.java:7918: cannot find symbol symbol : variable putnpccoords location: class client putnpccoords = true; ^ client.java:7919: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Wanneshop location: class client Wanneshop = 26; // Skill cape shop ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

BTW!! I added the number “26” randomly cause idk what goes there…=]

Read full topic

item.title: Help, added shops?
item.dc:creator: @runegay runegay
item.description:
@runegay wrote:

you didn’t close “(NPC id” with a )
like here

} else if (NPCID == 2253 {

should be

} else if (NPCID == 2253) {

item.title: Help, added shops?
item.dc:creator: @h311sd347h h311sd347h
item.description:
@h311sd347h wrote:

I added a shop, and I get this error

client.java:7917: ')' expected } else if (NPCID == 2253 { ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Here are two examples of a working ( first one) and the one i added (2nd one)

} else if (NPCID == 804) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 25; // Crafting shop } else if (NPCID == 2253 { putnpccoords = true; Wanneshop = 1; // Skill cape shop

Read full topic
